About Me

Iam Bibek Awasthi and I am a Student

Hello! Valuable Reader, Myself Bibek Awasthi. I am from Nepal. My journey as a web developer is not so long but I have experienced some of the tools and technologies used in web development. And I am continuosly learning new things everyday so that I can improve my skills. Currently, I am doing BCA at Acharya Institute of Graduate Studies, Bengaluru, Karnataka-560107.I love coding. Thank you for your precious time.Kindly have a look all around my portfolio website.

My Skills and Knowledges

While I was in my school days, and even after joining Science College for the Higher Studies, I used to have a curiosity regarding the websites I saw. I used to wonder how they are made and why they are made. This curiosity increases my interest in studying Computer science.That's why just after finishing my schooling,I joined BCA at AIGS, Bengaluru. Since then I am continuously learning new skills in the field of programming and coding. I have summarised some of my skills here in this section.
